chapters.title: Chapter 12: A Morning of Victory
chapters.info: Caraighan Maconar, p. 239 (297)—Aes Sedai of the Green Ajah, the heroine of hundreds of adventures, credited with exploits that even Aes Sedai consider improbable despite their inclusion in the Tower's records. These include single-handedly putting down a rebellion in Mosadorin and quelling the Comaidin Riots at a time when she had no Warders. She is considered to be the archetype of a Green sister, and is a strong role model for the eager novice Nicola Treehill. See also Kiramin, Mangore.
